last_episode_to_air.name: The Sacrifice (2)
last_episode_to_air.overview: The final showdown between the Krewe and Belial! Soleil is told by Ayida Weddo that she was given a final gift to help the Krewe stop Belial... but it comes with a hefty price.

name: Fright Krewe
overview: An ancient prophecy and a Voodoo Queen put misfit teens in charge of saving New Orleans from the biggest demonic threat itâ€™s faced in almost two centuries. But, honestly? Saving the world might be easier than becoming friends.

episodes.name: The Blood Awakening (1)
episodes.overview: When Soleil accidentally unleashes an ancient evil from a cursed graveyard, the spirit of Marie Laveau grants her and an unlikely group of kids powers from the Loa.

episodes.name: The Blood Awakening (2)
episodes.overview: Reeling from their new powers, the kids seek answers from Pat's Aunt Alma, a voodoo mambo, who helps them contact the spirits. But the mysterious "ancient evil" they unleashed goes after Missy and influences her into targeting Soleil in a deadly pursuit.

episodes.name: The Craving
episodes.overview: Soleil and Stanley learn thereâ€™s more to each other than they thought as they try to save Stanleyâ€™s sister, Cece, from rougarou Missy. Pat and Maybe search for offerings to summon Ogoun when creepy voices that only Pat can hear call out to them for help.

episodes.name: The Haunting
episodes.overview: Maybe still refuses to go to the Shadow Realm but when the Krewe is haunted by a school ghost, Soleil finds a way to get to the root of Maybe's fears. Belial knows the perfect weapon to help Furst get revenge, but it's in the heart of vampire territory...

episodes.name: The Feast
episodes.overview: When the Krewe realizes Belial feeds off fear, they watch over the Friday the 13th parade. Soleil realizes they need to work together to defeat The grunches! Missy learns to control her transformation. Maybe finds out the Bunradys are vampires.

episodes.name: The Swamp
episodes.overview: They go to the swamp and finds out Pat used to live here until his dad passed away in a gator accident. Pat never believed the story, and a mysterious voice offers to tell him the truth. Mayor Furst and Belial send a creature to eliminate the Krewe.

episodes.name: The Light
episodes.overview: After learning from Honey Lou that Patâ€™s dad had his soul trapped by the Feu Follet, the Krewe helps Pat free his dad and say one last goodbye. Belial and Mayor Furst visit the Necromancer to coerce him into altering rougarou Malcolm's final memory.

episodes.name: The Bait
episodes.overview: The Krewe has an opportunity to sneak into Furst Mansion, but their cover is almost blown. Meanwhile, Nelson's starting to get suspicious about Missy and Stanley's powers, and his dad makes it worse by advising Nelson not to trust them.

episodes.name: The Trap
episodes.overview: The Krewe gets caught and everything is going according to Furst and Belial's plan. After facing Belial, Soleil experiences true horror and her spirit is broken. We learn what drove Mayor Furst to the dark side.

episodes.name: The War
episodes.overview: Furst uses a spell to lead the rougarous and vampires to their deaths. To free themselves and stop the war, the Krewe must convince Nelson that his dad's beliefs are wrong. Soleil must make a choice between good and evil.

episodes.name: The Nightmare
episodes.overview: After the events of Season One, Soleil struggles to cope without her Ayida Weddo powers. Her Kooshma-induced nightmares lead Soleil to the discovery of how her ancestor, Pierre, is responsible for Belial's reign of terror.

episodes.name: The Loss
episodes.overview: When Belial offers to give Soleil his dark powers in lieu of Ayida Weddo, Soleil is determined to not give in to going down the dark path of her ancestor.

episodes.name: The Bridge
episodes.overview: With the girls doing their own thing, Stanley plans a bro-day to include Nelson with the guys from the Krewe. Everyone tries to make it work but they just seem to be from different worlds until one of Belialâ€™s demons threatens Stanley.

episodes.name: The Collection
episodes.overview: When a fellow demon threatens Belialâ€™s plans, he lures Missyâ€™s parents into the demonâ€™s clutches, causing the Krewe to hunt for a mystical demon fighting object that will save the parents before itâ€™s too late.

episodes.name: The Escape
episodes.overview: Coming face-to-face with a New Orleans legend, the Krewe risks life and limb to retrieve the one thing that can destroy Gilda; trading places with her parents, Missy fights to stay alive in the dangerous painting.

episodes.name: The Return
episodes.overview: Belial has the Kreweâ€™s backs against the wall when his plan to make the town fear creatures comes to fruition.

episodes.name: The Decay
episodes.overview: As a gesture in solidarity, the humans and the creatures start planning a Unity Fest together. But the humans who still arenâ€™t on board with creatures team up with Belial to stop it. We start to see the sparks between Nelson and Missy rekindleâ€¦

episodes.name: The Descent
episodes.overview: The Krewe takes a trip to the underworld in order to defeat the rot demon and save Missy. While there, Soleil discovers she still has the dark flames, and they're the only powers that work in the underworld.

episodes.name: The Sacrifice (1)
episodes.overview: In part one of our series finale, Belial uses the beaded citizens of the Thirteenth and a Third to wreak havoc on their own town in an effort to get Soleil to do what he wants - destroy the Tree of Life.

episodes.name: The Sacrifice (2)
episodes.overview: The final showdown between the Krewe and Belial! Soleil is told by Ayida Weddo that she was given a final gift to help the Krewe stop Belial... but it comes with a hefty price.
